name: Bernard
overview:
Bernard is a series of animated shorts centered on the fictional polar bear and main character of the same name. It is a Korean-Spanish-French co-production.

Each three-minute episode focuses on the bear's curiosity and have many moments of slapstick. Bernard never speaks with the exception of unintelligible noises.

Bernard is accompanied in the cartoons by a few other characters: Lloyd and Eva the penguins, Zack the lizard, Goliat the chihuahua, Sam the baby, Pilot the dog, Pokey the porcupine and Santa Claus.

He usually gets knocked unconscious or severely injured at the end of an episode, due to some calamity caused by his bumbling.

episodes.name: The Gym
episodes.overview: Bernard goes to the gym and starts training enthusiastically.

episodes.name: Golf
episodes.overview: Bernard experiences the powerful attraction of the golf course.

episodes.name: Ice Climbing
episodes.overview: Bernard sets off to climb the highest peak but it's tricker the closer he gets to the top.

episodes.name: The Swing
episodes.overview: Bernard finds a beautiful tree with a swing. But someone else has got there first.

episodes.name: Security Guard
episodes.overview: Bernard is very familiar with the exhibits in the museum where he works.

episodes.name: Diving Board
episodes.overview: Bernard desperately tries to copy all the things that Lloyd the penguin enjoys doing.

episodes.name: Watching TV
episodes.overview: Whatever the time, wherever he is, Bernard is completely hooked on television.

episodes.name: Vending Machine
episodes.overview: Sportsmanship is about knowing how to win and how to lose.

episodes.name: Sky Diving
episodes.overview: If Bernard ever jumps out of the plane, he's bound to forget his parachute.

episodes.name: At the Theme Park
episodes.overview: Bernard just wants to have a good time at the theme park.

episodes.name: A Day in the Country
episodes.overview: It looks like rain, but Bernard's not worried because he's got his umbrella.

episodes.name: Learning to Fly
episodes.overview: Bernard is learning to fly, and may not have chosen the best day.

episodes.name: Close Encounters
episodes.overview: Bernard wants to watch a movie, but an UFO forces him to change his plans.

episodes.name: Basketball
episodes.overview: Animated adventures. There's nothing Bernard likes better than a challenge.

episodes.name: Bowling
episodes.overview: Bowling Bernard the bowling champ takes on a clumsy challenger.

episodes.name: The Desert Island
episodes.overview: Bernard finds himself on a desert island and alienates the locals.

episodes.name: Scuba Diving
episodes.overview: Bernard looks forward to a day's scuba diving.

episodes.name: Doors
episodes.overview: Most people can negotiate revolving doors, but Bernard is not quite like everyone else.

episodes.name: North Pole
episodes.overview: Miles of arctic wasteland are boring Bernard.

episodes.name: Taekwondo
episodes.overview: Animated adventures. Bernard decides to learn Taekwondo.

episodes.name: Baseball
episodes.overview: Bernard runs into trouble with the baseball pitching machine.

episodes.name: The Motorboat
episodes.overview: Bernard has been shipwrecked, but his real problems begin when he finds a motorboat.

episodes.name: The Medallion
episodes.overview: Animated adventures of Bernard the Polar Bear. Bernard finds a medallion.

episodes.name: The Moth
episodes.overview: Bernard's kitchen is invaded by a moth.

episodes.name: Bullfighter
episodes.overview: Despite his lack of experience Bernard decides to try some bull fighting.

episodes.name: At the Museum
episodes.overview: Bernard pays a visit to a museum.

episodes.name: The Package
episodes.overview: Zack tries to steal a parcel which Bernard is carrying, and at first he succeeds.

episodes.name: Sleepwalker
episodes.overview: Bernard discovers that he has been sleepwalking.

episodes.name: The Prisoner
episodes.overview: Bernard makes a daring escape from prison.

episodes.name: The Supermarket
episodes.overview: Bernard is delighted with the bargains he has bought. The problem is how to get them home.

episodes.name: The Treasure
episodes.overview: A map may lead to hidden treasure, but does not always mention the hidden dangers.

episodes.name: The Window Cleaner
episodes.overview: Bernard is cleaning the windows of a skyscraper when he disturbs two birds.

episodes.name: Marathon
episodes.overview: Children's animation. Bernard, Zack and Lloyd are competing in a marathon.

episodes.name: A Lucky Day
episodes.overview: Is it possible for an accident prone polar bear to have a lucky day?

episodes.name: The Little Dog
episodes.overview: Animation. Goliath may be tiny but he packs an oversize charge of aggression.

episodes.name: Close Encounters 2
episodes.overview: Animated adventures. A UFO appears on Bernard's radar.

episodes.name: The Mosquito
episodes.overview: Bernard feels very tired and wants to sleep for hours, but there's a mosquito about.

episodes.name: Oasis
episodes.overview: In the middle of the desert Bernard stumbles across an oasis. The palm trees look real.

episodes.name: The Storm
episodes.overview: Bernard has a polar home on the ice cap, but is forced to leave after a storm.

episodes.name: The Robot
episodes.overview: A robot seems to offer Bernard a simple solution to the problem of cleaning his house.

episodes.name: The Vacuum Cleaner
episodes.overview: When the vacuum cleaner finishes its work, there's no sign of Bernard's lottery ticket.

episodes.name: A Day in the Country 2
episodes.overview: Animated adventures of Bernard the polar bear. Bernard wants to enjoy nature.
